metadata.title: CVE-2019-19066 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A memory leak in the bfad_im_get_stats() function indrivers/scsi/bfa/bfad_attr.c in the Linux kernel through 5.3.11 allowsattackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) by triggeringbfa_port_get_stats() failures, aka CID-0e62395da2bd.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
